abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo floats proposal to create new inspector general with oversight of state issues at Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, and new special prosecutor with investigative powers over state procurement process; critics of Cuomo's plans, including New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman, call proposal 'scheme' and argue it allows agencies to police themselves, practice that does not work.

headline.print_headline: Cuomo Plan for an Executive-Branch Prosecutor Is Called a ‘Scheme’
headline.main: Cuomo’s Proposal for an Executive-Branch Prosecutor Is Called a ‘Scheme’

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Amid haggling over raising lawmakers’ pay, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York has proposed a new prosecutor, controlled by him, to investigate state spending....
lead_paragraph: Amid haggling over raising lawmakers’ pay, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo of New York has proposed a new prosecutor, controlled by him, to investigate state spending.
